Name: Unfocused
Description: Set all dice to the same random value
Script: var randvalue = rand([1|2|3|4|5|6]); var c = 0; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ mydice.animatereroll(randvalue| self.screenposition()| c * 0.05); c++; } }

Name: Overload
Script: for(x in target.status) { if(x.type.split(~~).length > 4) { if(x.type.substr(0|5) == ~jinx_~) { continue; } } if(x.type != ~beartransform~ && x.type != ~extradamage~ && x.stacks) { inflict(x.type|x.value); } } for(x in self.status) { if(x.type.split(~~).length > 4) { if(x.type.substr(0|5) == ~jinx_~) { continue; } } if(x.type != ~beartransform~ && x.type != ~extradamage~ && x.stacks) { inflict(x.type|x.value); } } sfx(~_thinghappens~); //code lifted and overhauled from jacke's starsear+. excludes jinx and beartransform; to stay consistent with what overload considers an increasable status.
